summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Drainage and Wastewater Utility; amending Section 21.28.070 of the Seattle Municipal Code to revise adjustments to charges; amending Section 21.28.080 to adjust for non-sewer water usage; amending Section 21.28.370 to increase wastewater rates; and amending Section 21.33.030 of the Seattle Municipal Code to increase drainage rates.
